Name: FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0™ HD
About the game: Step into the fray as Class Zero, a group of students from an elite military academy whose country is attacked by an aggressive neighbouring Empire. In the brutal and harrowing struggle that follows, defeat the Empire and uncover the secrets behind the war using a range of powerful magical and combat abilities and an exciting new battle system. Key Features: Upgraded graphics resolution options for high end pc’s Improved in-game battle camera Full controller support Full STEAM achievements and trading cards Scalable motion blur settings New Character speed boost Increased blood levels from the original PSP version Customizable dynamic screen shot mode
